level.heading: Rules.
level.text: The Mayor shall, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2 [ยง 2-501 et seq.], issue rules to implement the provisions of this subchapter.

level.heading: Legislative history of Law 10-44
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-44, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 31-701.
